casebody.data:
No. 10-854. Richard Rosario, Petitioner v. Patrick Griffin, Superintendent, Southport Correctional Facility, et al. 563 U.S. 1016, 131 S. Ct. 2901,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1262,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4007. May 23, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of these petitions.

Same case below, 601 F.3d 118.
